html:
flowers waiting for bees
cars going around
people walking around
fresh coffee in a cafeteria
someone cutting the grass
an old man taking rest in a park
a child being born in a hospital
air conditioning coolin the air
a worker producing steel
hackers breaking a cipher
someone paying their bills
old woman praying in a church
train getting to the station on time
a concert in a local opera
night full of stars
it smells like armageddon
title: Bees
